content.title: Thank You!
content.creator:
Seesaw
March 7, 2025
content.content:
Dear Dockcasers,
Thank you for your continued trust in usÔºÅ
Next, Payment Collection Process.
When a campaign ends, Kickstarter starts a 7-day pledge collection process, so please keep an eye on your mailbox and "Action Needed" banner from Kickstarter in case the pledge fails to collect. 
If your pledge has been declined, you‚Äôll need to log in to your Kickstarter account and click the ‚ÄúFix payment‚Äù button in the banner at the top of your screen. This will guide you through the process of changing or retrying your payment method. Kickstarter'll also send you an email every 48 hours with a direct link to correct the issue.
Reference:
 My pledge was declined, can I fix this through the app? 
A project I'm backing just succeeded but my pledge was declined. What do I need to do next?
What forms of payment can I use to make a pledge?
Common Pledge Problems
What Happens if Collection Issues Aren't Resolved?
If backers don't resolve the payment issues within 7 days from campaign's deadline, their pledges are unfortunately dropped.
We will send you the survey and post an update after the 7-day pledge collection process. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to us(service@dockcase.com). 
Best regards,  
Dockcase
